name: horoscopes.rambler.ru - без рекламы
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("horoscopes.rambler.ru")
{
.bannertop, DIV[align="center"],
.begun_adv_cell,
  .l-content__aside,
.y5_ad,
.y5_h,
.right-bnr,
.guide_bnr,
#yandex_ad,
.rmbr-h-table.rmbr-h-table-custom,
.b-guides__item.guide.guide__bnr.no-popup,
.b-guides__item.b-guides__item--bnr.no-popup.js-guide,
.topline-wrapper,
#text_blk_ind20,
  .b-ad.b-direct.direct,
IMG[style="margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 5px; border: medium none; top: 0px; float: left;"]
{display: none !important;}
}
